tasks.label: detect-com-port
args: $json = & "${workspaceFolder}\nRF52840_code\nrfutil.exe" device list --json --skip-overhead; $obj = $json | ConvertFrom-Json; if ($obj.devices -and $obj.devices.Count -gt 0 -and $obj.devices[0].serialPorts.Count -gt 0) { $obj.devices[0].serialPorts[0].comName | Out-File .vscode/comport.txt } else { "NO-DEVICE" | Out-File .vscode/comport.txt }
